pageContext.claim: “We added 1.8 million new jobs in July, exceeding predictions for the third month in a row, and adding a total of over 9.3 million jobs since May. And I will say that the job growth that we've seen over the last three months -- 9.3 million -- is the single greatest three-month period of job creation in American history. That's big stuff. That's big news and great news.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump acts if these are jobs created, when in fact they are jobs recovered after the shutdown because of a coronavirus. We include this as a claim when he does not acknowledge the job gain is in some way related to easing of restrictions during the pandemic.
